Seth Ely signs a war fund pledge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man, seated at a desk or table, is holding a pencil to sign a paper. A war poster is on the wall behind him.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Badges; Posters; war bonds and funds; War posters
Ely, Seth
